63namespace OpenXLSX
64{
68 enum class XLCommandType {
69 SetSheetName,
70 SetSheetColor,
71 SetSheetVisibility,
72 SetSheetIndex,
73 SetSheetActive,
74 ResetCalcChain,
75 AddSharedStrings,
76 AddWorksheet,
77 AddChartsheet,
78 DeleteSheet,
79 CloneSheet,
80 };
81
85 class XLCommand
86 {
87 public:
88
93 explicit XLCommand(XLCommandType type) : m_type(type) {}
94
102 template<typename T>
103 XLCommand& setParam(const std::string& param, T value) {
104 m_params[param] = value;
105 return *this;
106 }
107
114 template<typename T>
115 T getParam(const std::string& param) const {
116 return std::any_cast<T>(m_params.at(param));
117 }
118
123 XLCommandType type() const {
124 return m_type;
125 }
126
127 private:
128 XLCommandType m_type; /*< */
129 std::map<std::string, std::any> m_params; /*< */
130 };
131
135 enum class XLQueryType {
136 QuerySheetName,
137 QuerySheetIndex,
138 QuerySheetVisibility,
139 QuerySheetIsActive,
140 QuerySheetType,
141 QuerySheetID,
142 QuerySheetRelsID,
143 QuerySheetRelsTarget,
144 QuerySharedStrings,
145 QueryXmlData
146 };
147
151 class XLQuery
152 {
153 public:
154
159 explicit XLQuery(XLQueryType type) : m_type(type) {}
160
168 template<typename T>
169 XLQuery& setParam(const std::string& param, T value) {
170 m_params[param] = value;
171 return *this;
172 }
173
180 template<typename T>
181 T getParam(const std::string& param) const {
182 return std::any_cast<T>(m_params.at(param));
183 }
184
191 template<typename T>
192 XLQuery& setResult(T value) {
193 m_result = value;
194 return *this;
195 }
196
202 template<typename T>
203 T result() const {
204 return std::any_cast<T>(m_result);
205 }
206
211 XLQueryType type() const {
212 return m_type;
213 }
214
215 private:
216 XLQueryType m_type; /*< */
217 std::any m_result; /*< */
218 std::map<std::string, std::any> m_params; /*< */
219 };
220
221} // namespace OpenXLSX
